menus.name: Soy sauce ramen
menus.author: @5amramen
menus.description: A classic Japanese ramen noodle soup that is made with a soy sauce-based broth.

menus.name: Sanuki Udon
menus.author: @jinomono
menus.description: A type of thick, chewy udon noodle that is made in Kagawa Prefecture, Japan.

menus.name: Zaru soba
menus.author: @gaspanik
menus.description: A cold soba noodle dish served with a dipping sauce.

menus.name: Spicy Miso Ramen
menus.author: @5amramen
menus.description: A spicy miso ramen with a rich and flavorful broth.

menus.name: Tempura bowl and soba set
menus.author: @bady
menus.description: A set meal consisting of a tempura bowl and a bowl of soba noodles.

menus.name: Seafood bowl
menus.author: @jangus231
menus.description: A bowl of rice topped with a variety of seafood, such as salmon, tuna, shrimp, and scallops.

menus.name: Daily set lunch
menus.author: @roppongi
menus.description: A daily set meal that changes daily.

menus.name: Khao soi
menus.author: @ural_8_low
menus.description: Khao Soi is a Northern Thai curry noodle soup with a rich and flavorful broth.

menus.name: Pad Thai
menus.author: @lockandkey
menus.description: Pad Thai with shrimp is a popular Thai noodle dish made with shrimp, flat rice noodles, vegetables, and a sweet and sour sauce.

menus.name: Tom Yum Goong
menus.author: @streets_of_food
menus.description: Tom Yum Goong is a spicy and sour soup made with shrimp, lemongrass, galangal, and kaffir lime leaves.

menus.name: Pad Kra Pao
menus.author: @streets_of_food
menus.description: a Thai rice dish made with stir-fried ground meat, Thai basil, and chili peppers.

menus.name: Margherita
menus.author: @amir_v_ali
menus.description: A pizza with tomato sauce, mozzarella cheese, and basil.

menus.name: Bolognese
menus.author: @emanuelekstrom
menus.description: A pasta dish with a meat sauce made with ground beef, pork, and veal.

menus.name: Carbonara
menus.author: @brunabranco
menus.description: A pasta dish with a cream sauce made with guanciale, eggs, and Parmesan cheese.
